statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 5 , -3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 3 , -4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x , -3 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 3 , -4 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
